channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (18 Dec 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:

My pleasure Chrissy, great to have you as a reader!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Chrissy.

My pleasure Chrissy, great to have you as a reader!

item.title: By: Chrissy
item.dc:creator: Chrissy
item.description: Just discovered this from the GenesisWP slack group! Thanks for the handy info and tips!
item.content:encoded: Just discovered this from the GenesisWP slack group! Thanks for the handy info and tips!

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-12-18/#comment-263">Susan</a>.
Thanks Susan, feeling a lot better!
A very Merry Christmas to you too.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Susan.

Thanks Susan, feeling a lot better!

A very Merry Christmas to you too.

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description:
Thanks for the mention about supporting the StudioPress community forum - there are a lot of users out there who don't belong to the FB group, or Slack, and use the StudioPress community forum; I worry that it's neglected at times :)
Happy Christmas! I hope your family is on the mend!
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the mention about supporting the StudioPress community forum – there are a lot of users out there who don’t belong to the FB group, or Slack, and use the StudioPress community forum; I worry that it’s neglected at times ðŸ™‚
